creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: gingko leaves in yellows, oranges, browns, and greens swirl and tumble against a cream-colored ground; discreetly peppered throughout the leaves are ants, lady bugs, moths, and small reptiles
markings: Red, square seal LRC of panel 4
medium: Gold leaf and color on paper
signed: Sheet of paper in black ink with red stamp -- URC on reverse of panel 1 adhered with tape and under plastic protector
title: The Foundation of Light
